personal_info.name: Chris A. Hagglund
personal_info.profile: Software Engineer specializing in backend development and infrastructure management for scalable applications, with a strong focus on performance and security.

overview: Self-directed and detail-oriented Software Engineer with a strong focus on back-end development, system architecture, and infrastructure management. Proven ability to leverage modern technologies to deliver scalable solutions, with a strong focus on efficiency, reliability, and security. Adept at leading projects that drive organizational success and enhance system performance.

examples.headline: Architected robust backend solutions
examples.body: for critical applications at Kraken, utilizing Rust and GitLabCI to enhance continuous delivery and scalability while ensuring high availability. Implemented best practices for security and resource management.

examples.headline: Developed a Bitcoin Lightning Network donation system
examples.body: demonstrating proficiency in blockchain technologies and decentralized applications, integrating with backend services to facilitate transactions while ensuring compliance with security protocols.

examples.headline: Enhanced deployment processes
examples.body: by creating a custom Terraform provider that synchronized resources with third-party APIs, streamlining infrastructure management and deployment workflows.

examples.headline: Engineered a Real-Time Bidding system
examples.body: for mobile advertising, eventually transitioning from Python to Go to optimize performance, handling hundreds of thousands more requests per second and ensuring stability across servers. This approach resulted in a 200% increase in overall throughput, with no additional hardware expense.

examples.headline: Re-architected a click tracking system
examples.body: to improve efficiency and click-through rates, implementing new backend strategies that enhanced overall performance. This project involved close collaboration with data teams to ensure accurate tracking.

examples.headline: Optimized database performance
examples.body: by implementing indexing strategies and query optimization techniques across projects, leading to faster data retrieval and improved system responsiveness.

examples.headline: Led cross-functional teams
examples.body: at Kraken to enhance backend infrastructure, focusing on continuous improvement and integration of best practices across departments. Championed the adoption of unified testing strategies.

examples.headline: Oversaw the development of key microservices
examples.body: at PerfectServe, integrating with third-party systems to enhance backend capabilities and improve service delivery. This initiative allowed replacing an expensive vendor product with in-house solutions for great cost savings.

examples.headline: Mentored junior engineers
examples.body: by providing guidance on best practices in backend development and infrastructure management, fostering a collaborative environment that encouraged skill development.
